QuestData.Title: A Damp, Dark Place
QuestData.Description: Soon after I escaped the Umbrafen tribe, I holed up in a cave south of their village. Little did I know that the cave was being fought over by marsh beasts and spore men!$B$BI had to leave in a hurry and left behind a box containing my only worldly possessions.$B$BAfter managing to sneak out of Umbrafen with my belongings it was terrible irony that I would lose them so soon after. If you're willing to bring them back to me I'll give you one of my very own personal items. What do you say, $n?
QuestData.LogDescription: Look for Ikeyen's Belongings inside a cave south of Umbrafen. Return them to Ikeyen at Cenarion Refuge in Zangarmarsh.
QuestData.CompletionText: Did you find my belongings, $n? The cave is not far from Umbrafen, near the border with Nagrand.
QuestData.RewardText: My things! They're all here!$B$BI thank you, $n. As promised, I'll let you pick one of the items for yourself. I don't have much to offer, but my people have always shared what little we have.
